bibl.title: Threatened Wombs: Aspects of Ancient Uterine Magic.
bibl.note: Magical practices and religious beliefs pertaining to the womb. Interpretation of the Graeco-Egyptian uterine amulets with the help of the magical papyri (p. 430: new reading of P. Warren 21).
bibl.seg: Aubert Jean-Jacques, Threatened Wombs: Aspects of Ancient Uterine Magic.
Magical practices and religious beliefs pertaining to the womb. Interpretation of the Graeco-Egyptian uterine amulets with the help of the magical papyri (p. 430: new reading of P. Warren 21).
